      • register

        public StoragePoolRestRep register(java.net.URI poolId,
                                   java.net.URI storageSystemId)
        Registers a storage pool with the given storage system.

        API Call: POST /vdc/storage-systems/{storageSystemId}/storage-pools/{poolId}/register

        Parameters:
        poolId - the ID of the storage pool.
        storageSystemId - the ID of the storage system.
        Returns:
        the storage pool.
